SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionProvider<TPayload,TContext>
Provides an entry point for executing an action within a scenario.
Assertions
Marker annotation for providing a List<AssertionsProvider<TContext>> to a test scenario.
AssertionsProvider<TContext>
Provides a mechanism for performing assertions using the scenario context.
ConfigurableTestScenarioScanner
Helper class for scanning the classpath to find classes annotated with ConfigureTestScenario.
ConfigureTestScenario
Annotation for configuring a test scenario in Spring-based scenario testing.
ContextProvider<TContext>
Initializes and prepares the test scenario context for use in subsequent steps.
DefaultTestScenarioExecutor
The default implementation of TestScenarioExecutor, orchestrating the execution of a test scenario.
EnableTestScenarioWeaving
Enables annotation-based test scenario creation by importing TestScenarioWeavingRegistrar.
InjectTestScenario
Annotation for injecting a TestScenario into JUnit tests by name.
InjectTestScenario
Annotation for injecting a TestScenario into Spring-based tests.
PayloadProvider<TContext>
Provides payloads for use in the ActionProvider, utilizing the scenario context.
SpringTestScenarioWeaverExtension
JUnit Jupiter extension for injecting TestScenario beans into Spring-based tests.
StubsProvider<TContext>
Sets up stubs for mocking external or internal calls within a scenario.
TestScenario<TPayload,TContext>
Represents a complete setup for an integration test scenario.
TestScenarioBean
Meta annotation for defining a TestScenario bean in bean-based configuration.
TestScenarioBuilder<TPayload,TContext>
Builds TestScenario instances using a fluent API.
TestScenarioContext<TPayload>
Represents the context for a test scenario, holding state and data relevant to scenario execution.
TestScenarioExecutor
Executes a TestScenario, automating the integration test flow.
TestScenarioFactoryBean
FactoryBean implementation for creating TestScenario instances using annotation-based configuration in Spring.
TestScenarioPipe<T>
A fluent utility for chaining and executing the steps of a test scenario.
TestScenarioProvider
Provides lookup functionality for TestScenario instances by name.
TestScenarios
Meta-annotation for grouping test scenarios in bean-based configuration.
TestScenarioSource
Marks a field as the source for TestScenarioProvider implementations.
TestScenarioWeaverExtension
JUnit Jupiter extension for injecting TestScenario instances into test methods.
TestScenarioWeavingRegistrar
Spring ImportBeanDefinitionRegistrar for registering test scenario beans based on annotation configuration.
